Unleash the power of the Lightning Blade with this incredible, action-packed figure of the legendary Copy Ninja, Kakashi Hatake, from Naruto: Shippuden.
Standing at an impressive 20 cm, this dynamic figure captures Kakashi in a powerful mid-air lunge as he prepares to strike with his signature jutsu. The highlight of the piece is the stunning translucent blue effect part, masterfully recreating the crackling energy of his Chidori.
Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this figure is a perfect tribute to one of the series' most beloved characters. It comes with a specially designed stand to hold Kakashi in his gravity-defying pose, making it a standout centerpiece in any collection.

entry.title: Death Note Themed Feather Quill Calligraphy Pen Set with Inkwell Stand & 5 Nibs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Action Nook
Type:
Price: 499.00

Wield the power of the written word with this exquisite calligraphy set inspired by the legendary anime, Death Note. Perfect for fans, collectors, and aspiring calligraphers, this set combines classic elegance with iconic anime flair.
The centerpiece is a stunning white feather quill, emblazoned with the "DEATH NOTE" title, attached to an ornate metal handle that provides a comfortable and balanced grip. The included bottle of rich black ink comes in a unique inkwell that also functions as a convenient stand to hold your pen when not in use.
To suit any writing or drawing style, this comprehensive set includes five interchangeable stainless steel nibs, allowing for a variety of line widths and artistic expressions. The entire collection is presented in a beautifully designed gift box with a vintage aesthetic, making it the perfect gift for any occasion.
What's Included:
* 1 x Death Note Feather Quill Pen: An elegant writing instrument featuring a genuine feather and a decorative metal alloy grip.
* 1 x Bottle of Black Ink: High-quality ink for smooth, consistent lines.
* 1 x Inkwell with Pen Stand: A clever dual-purpose design to store your ink and hold your quill.
* 5 x Interchangeable Metal Nibs: A versatile selection for different calligraphy and drawing styles.
* 1 x Themed Gift Box: Perfect for presentation and storage.

Capture the calm, calculating, and charismatic leader of the Phantom Troupe with this stunning perching figure of Chrollo Lucilfer from the acclaimed series Hunter x Hunter.
This figure, standing at an impressive 16 cm, depicts Chrollo in a relaxed, seated pose, ready to be placed on the edge of your shelf, desk, or monitor. The sculpt masterfully captures his iconic design, from his slicked-back black hair and distinctive cross tattoo on his forehead to his elegant fur-collared coat.
With a focused and enigmatic expression, Chrollo is seen holding his unique Nen book, "Bandit's Secret," hinting at the countless abilities stolen and stored within. The attention to detail in his clothing, accessories, and poised demeanor makes this a high-quality, must-have collectible for any fan.

entry.title: One Piece Roronoa Zoro Figure - 15cm Wano Country Arc Statue with Interchangeable Head
entry.summary:
Vendor: Action Nook
Type:
Price: 599.00

Unleash the "King of Hell" in your collection with this incredibly detailed 15cm figure of Roronoa Zoro from the Wano Country Arc! This dynamic statue captures Zoro in a powerful, relaxed pose, seated on a stylized box that adds to his formidable presence.
The figure showcases Zoro in his Wano attire, complete with his black clothes and a unique red pearl necklace. His signature swords are sheathed on his back, and he holds one in a contemplative stance. A standout feature of this collectible is the interchangeable head piece, allowing you to display Zoro with his classic green spiky hair and a confident, battle-ready grin. The sculpted purple and red effects on his arm and sword represent his powerful Haki and add a dynamic visual element.
Key Features:
* Iconic Wano Design: Faithfully recreates Zoro's look from the Wano Arc, including his attire and accessories.
* Interchangeable Head: Comes with an additional head piece, offering two distinct display options to capture different moments of the character.
* Intricate Sculpting: The figure is meticulously crafted, from the detailing on his muscles to the flowing effects on his sword.
* Dynamic Base: Zoro is seated on a beautifully sculpted box with the Straw Hat Pirates' Jolly Roger emblem, making for a unique and eye-catching display.
* Perfect Collector's Item: A must-have for any One Piece fan, celebrating one of the series' most beloved and powerful characters.
Bring the World's Greatest Swordsman to your home and showcase his strength and resolve. This Zoro figure is the perfect way to commemorate the epic events of Wano and a fantastic addition to any collection!
